Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides information, advice, assistance and support to people affected by asbestos-related disease. Aims to raise public awareness about asbestos-related disease and the continuing hazards of asbestos. Also provides briefing/training sessions to agencies/groups on the subject of asbestos hazards. Home visits by arrangement. Self or any referral.
